heading: Pitjantjatjara language materials.
general-note: Here are entered works written in Pitjantjatjara intended primarily for general information or recreational reading. Such works with text also given in English are further subdivided by the subdivision Bilingual, i.e. Pitjantjatjara language materials--Bilingual. Reading texts in Pitjantjatjara containing material for instruction and practice in reading that language are entered under. Pitjantjatjara language--Readers..
